Title(s): On the Kentish Insurrection of Robert of Redesdale (1450)
Subjects: historical poems; Redesdale, Robert of; Kent
_description: On the Kentish Insurrection of Robert of Redesdale (1450) — one 6-line stanza

OxfMagdCharmisc.First Lines: God be oure gydeand then schull we spede…
OxfMagdCharmisc.Last Lines: …God seend vs a ffayre daya wey traytours a wey
OxfMagdCharmisc.Note: Item 14; in couplets in this MS.
